revised_title: Thorium and Uranium Oxides in Thorianite: Radio-Activity Distribution
tldr: The author analyzes the composition of Thorianite, a mineral containing thorium and uranium oxides, and investigates the distribution of radioactivity among its various constituents. The study aims to understand the changes occurring in the radioactive minerals and identify their products. The author also discusses the methods employed in the chemical analysis of Thorianite and the experiments conducted to determine the radioactivity of its separated fractions.
